name: messagepedia-webrtc-electron
description: Complete P2P MessagePedia replacement with WebRTC + Electron

scripts.db:init: node -e "const db = require('./src/database/DatabaseManager'); new db().initialize().then(() => console.log('Database initialized'))"
scripts.db:stats: node -e "const db = require('./src/database/DatabaseManager'); const dbManager = new db(); dbManager.initialize().then(async () => { console.log(await dbManager.getStats()); dbManager.close(); })"
